\newcommand{\bm}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}

Let $\bm{a}$, $\bm{b}$, and $\bm{c}$ be vectors such that $\lbrace \bm{a},
\bm{b}, \bm{c} \rbrace$ is linearly dependent. Show that

$$
\begin{vmatrix}
  \bm{a} \cdot \bm{a} & \bm{a} \cdot \bm{b} & \bm{a} \cdot \bm{c} \\
  \bm{b} \cdot \bm{a} & \bm{b} \cdot \bm{b} & \bm{b} \cdot \bm{c} \\
  \bm{c} \cdot \bm{a} & \bm{c} \cdot \bm{b} & \bm{c} \cdot \bm{c} \\
\end{vmatrix} = 0
$$

\let\bm\undefined
